package.name: DB_ado
package.summary: DB driver which use MS ADODB library
package.description: DB_ado is a database independent query interface definition for Microsoft's ADODB library using PHP's COM extension. This class allows you to connect to different datasource only on a Win32 system, like MS Access, MS SQL Server, Oracle and other. Moreover it exists the possibility to use MS Excel spreadsheets, XML and text files as data source.

release.notes: Adding data to OLE fields is not supported yet.
